I. A confirmação de Sms fará alteraçõe: I. Sms confirmation will only make changes to the status of the first schedule after the response time. So guide your customer to reply to SMS immediately after receiving your message.
II. Ainda que seu cliente responda pron: II. Even if your customer responds promptly to your message, there may be a delay in the delivery of the SMS for issues related to the Mobile Service Operator.
III. As respostas enviadas, a depender d: III. The replies sent, depending on the time and date, may change different attendances from those which they were sent.
IV. As respostas de seus clientes somen: IV. Your customers' responses will only be valid: if they are equal to "Y" for confirmation of service, or "N" for pre-cancellation of the service.

Em poucas palavras, descreva o que motiv: In a few words, describe what motivated your score about the indication: (optional)
Já realizou algum tratamento estético an: Have you done any cosmetic treatments before? In which company/clinic have you been treated?
Qual a sua opinião em relação ao tempo d: What is your opinion about the time of treatment?
O que você achou do equipamento/cosmétic: What did you think of the tested equipment/cosmetic?
Já tinha feito ou ouvido falar em alguma: Have you ever done or heard of any technique the same or similar to the one you used? At where?
Qual a sua satisfação em relação aos pro: What is your satisfaction with the products used?
Qual seu nível de satisfação quanto ao r: What is your level of satisfaction with the final result offered by our treatment?
Qual o seu nível de satisfação quanto ao: How satisfied are you with the time it takes to get results with our treatment?
Em relação ao toque da pele, qual a sens: With regard to the touch of the skin, what does the treatment feel like?
Qual a sensação percebida durante a apli: What is the sensation perceived during the application?
Indicaria nosso tratamento para um amigo: Would you recommend our treatment to a friend?
Você compraria o tratamento realizado? P: Would you buy the treatment done? Why?

Para deixar sua mensagem em itálico, col: To set your message in italics, place an underscore on each side of the text, for example: _text_
Para deixar sua mensagem em negrito, col: To set your message bold, place an asterisk on each side of the text, for example: * text *
Para tachar sua mensagem, coloque um til: To cross out your message, place a tilde on each side of the text, for example: ~ text ~
